meanings.definition: A tall building with many floors
meanings.sent1: The highrise stood tall in the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: I live on the top floor of the highrise.
meanings.sent3: The highrise seemed to touch the clouds, making it a challenge for birds to fly over.
meanings.sent4: The highrise loomed over the neighborhood like a giant.
meanings.sent5: The highrise cast a long shadow over the bustling streets below.

meanings.definition: To construct or be constructed as a highrise building
meanings.sent1: The construction company will highrise the new apartment complex next month.
meanings.sent2: They highrise buildings quickly in this booming city.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally highrised my sandcastle too much, and it collapsed under its own weight.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline highrised with new buildings every year.
meanings.sent5: The builders highrised the structure with impressive speed.
